A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The character play was gripping\, interesting and dynamic between the leads\, but the storytelling of the OT characters (Luke/Leia)\, and some from Force Awakens (Finn/Poe)\, was a complete divergent within the series\, not believable\, and without any bridge.  A true letdown\, almost walked out when Leia Poppins had her 'moment'.
